Metadata: "Heterocarpus cutressi," new species, and "Plesionika macropoda" Chace, 1939: two caridean shrimps of the family Pandalidae (Crustacea: Decapoda) from Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands
"Proceedings of the Biological Society of Washington," 101(3):633-639, 1988.

Two species of deep-water (320-777 m) pandalid shrimps are reported. Previously undescribed is "Heterocarpus cutressi," n. sp. "Plesionika macropoda" is redescribed due to lack of figures in the original description. Specimens of both species were collected in baited, wire-mesh traps.
